cab.content: .... . Wfei,3 his Document n tho d^.^^worMilitary Secret, 1327879Wrovi Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,ttthMarch 1920.ss^^p"^ (Received 11 p.m.)3535. No. 171.Part 1.-1. Mahsiid Jirga on 1 Lth and 12th attended by all main sections decided to do utmost to comply with terms. Government rifles being collected and some sections have handed in instalments of fine and tribal rifles.2. Reference to para. 3 of serial No. 167, Hindustani fanatics reported 35 in uamber have arrived at Shakai ten miles south-west of Kaniguram.3. Wani Waziris of Shakai are trying to collect Government rifles in anticipation of our terms. Reference to para. 2 of serial No. 168. Wana Waziri Lashkar has returned home.Part II. 4. Derajat column. Nothing to report. Heavy snow and rain has been falling in Kaniguram.5. Baluchistan. Large gang of trans-border raiders reported in Peshin-Hindubagh area. Small mobile columns are being formed at Peshin and Hindubagh to deal with them.Para. 2 not communicated to Press.
